Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 165th overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Alphonso Anguita (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2015, off Antonio Montejano (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2016, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,200,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2017, hitting .548 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,528,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2018, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,528,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/6/2019 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/11/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against St. Louis (B) on 8/15/2020...
10/14/2020: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $11,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/6/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $2,110,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/6/2026 to a 1-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 5/11/2027 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 5/26/2028 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
